cause.description:
It seems that Arabs and Desis are divided by race. This cause believes that you should not be seen for your race but for who you are and what you stand for. Generations before us have let race split the Ummah apart but this generation is making a step to bring the two together and start a new trend for the rest of the world to adopt, that we are all one and race is nothing but your past and origin and you shouldn't judge everyone based of that.
1. One Ummah
2. Not to see the race but the person
cause.mission: For Arabs and Desis to Unite and not let race divide Muslims
cause.name: Arabs and Desis Unite
